subHeading.title: Your action is required!
subHeading.content: You have to fill in your Merchant and Secret key(s) again in the configuration to continue using Buckaroo. With this version we have improved the overall security, but reentering your keys is needed.

subHeading.title: Buckaroo Plaza
subHeading.content: In the Buckaroo Plaza https://plaza.buckaroo.nl the Merchant Key can be found under: My Buckaroo > Websites. The Secret Key can be found under: Configuration > Security > Secret Key.

subHeading.title: Magento Configuration
subHeading.content: You can find the fields in the Magento Configuration. In the left menu click on Stores > Configuration > Sales > Buckaroo.

subHeading.title: Support
subHeading.content: Need help? Buckaroo support by phone: +31(0)30-711 50 50 or by mail: support@buckaroo.nl
